results.title: Prospective Evaluation of Effect of Metformin on Activation of AMP-activated Protein Kinase (AMPK) and Disease Control in a Sub-group Analysis of Patients with GI Malignancies
results.text_hl: This sub-group analysis on @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005770 @@@GI cancers@@@ revealed an increase in @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ phosphorylation on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, further reassuring the potential role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in preventive and treatment settings in @<m>DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005770 @@@GI malignancies@@@.

results.title: Efficacy of Metformin and Chemotherapeutic Agents on the Inhibition of Colony Formation and Shh/Gli1 Pathway: Metformin/Docetaxel Versus Metformin/5-Fluorouracil.
results.text_hl: Despite their potent anti-@DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ effects, chemoresistance occurs in metastatic @DISEASE_Stomach_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D013274 @@@gastric cancer@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, a popular anti-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ drug, has been proven to have potent anticancer effects on @<m>DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005770 @@@gastrointestinal cancers@@@.

results.title: The First Study Evaluating the Safety of Pre-Surgery Administration of Metformin in Patients with Colorectal and other Gastrointestinal Cancers and Effect on Cancer Stem Cells.
results.text_hl: Comparison of markers of CCSC results showed that expression of @GENE_PROM1 @GENE_8842 @@@CD133@@@, @GENE_POU5F1 @GENE_5460 @@@OCT4@@@ and @GENE_NANOG @GENE_79923 @@@NANOG@@@ expression were decreased following @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. CONCLUSIONS: Our pilot study showed feasibility of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ before surgery in @<m>DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005770 @@@GI cancers@@@ and indicated impact on CSC.

results.title: Association between sodium-glucose cotransporter 2 inhibitors and cancer: a systematic review and meta-analysis of randomized active-controlled trials.
results.text_hl: Subgroup analysis indicated a significant reduction in the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005770 @@@gastrointestinal cancer@@@ with @GENE_SLC5A2 @GENE_6524 @@@SGLT2@@@ inhibitors compared to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (RR 0.23; 95%CI 0.06-0.95; p = 0.04).

results.title: Impact of metformin on survival outcome of esophageal squamous cell carcinomas patients undergoing surgical resection: a multicenter retrospective study
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@Diabetes mellitus@@@ is a recognized risk factor for @DISEASE_Esophageal_Squamous_Cell_Carcinoma @DISEASE_MESH:D000077277 @@@esophageal squamous cell carcinomas@@@ (@DISEASE_Esophageal_Squamous_Cell_Carcinoma @DISEASE_MESH:D000077277 @@@ESCC@@@), and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is a recognized protective factor for some @<m>DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005770 @@@gastrointestinal tumors@@@.
